description: This easy quick pea and mint pesto recipe is perfect to dip, spread or toss through pasta. Whiz up this healthier snack for the kids today.
keywords: Pesto,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Healthier Easier,Back to school,Budget,Halal,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Quick Pea Pesto Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 bunch mint, leaves picked, roughly chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Place peas in a heatproof bowl, cover with boiling water and stand for 5 minutes or until bright green and tender. Drain. Refresh under cold water, then drain.
Place peas, ricotta, garlic, lemon juice, oil and mint in a food processor and process for 1 minute or until almost smooth. Serve with crispbreads.
